title: Canadian Labour Force Summary Data (1995-96)
description:
Description
The number of workers in the Canadian
labour force broken down by region (BC, Alberta, Prairies,
Ontario, Quebec, Atlantic) for the 24-month period from January,
1995 to December, 1996 (a time when Canada was emerging from a
deep economic recession).
reference: These data have been seasonally adjusted.

parameters.Quebec: monthly labour force counts in Quebec
parameters.BC: monthly labour force counts in British Columbia
parameters.Ontario: monthly labour force counts in Ontario
parameters.Prairies:
monthly labour force counts in Saskatchewan and 
Manitoba
parameters.Alberta: monthly labour force counts in Alberta
parameters.Atlantic:
monthly labour force counts in Newfoundland, Nova 
Scotia, Prince Edward Island and New Brunswick

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
